content:
I am trying to make this work in HAPI JPA and am having some problems.

The search parameter:

{
  "resourceType": "SearchParameter",
  "id": "BundleSearchMeasure",
  "name": "BundleSearchMeasure",
  "status": "active",
  "experimental": true,
  "publisher": "Acme Inc",
  "description": "Search by measure extension",
  "base": [
    "Bundle"
  ],
  "type": "reference",
  "code": "measure",
  "expression": "Bundle.meta.extension('http://acme.com/StructureDefinition/extension-measure')"
}

An example bundle:

{
  "resourceType": "Bundle",
  "id": "single-gaps-open-indv-report01",
  "meta": {
    "extension": [
      {
        "url": "http://acme.com/StructureDefinition/extension-measure",
        "valueCanonical": "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/Measure/measure-exm130-example"
      }
    ],
  },
  "type": "document"
}

And this search attempt:

http://localhost:8080/fhir/Bundle?measure=http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/Measure/measure-exm130-example

I get 0 results...
Ah, I had a typo. This works fine.
Brian Kaney has marked this topic as resolved.
